Question.Subject: how do i get the text in the textbox back after accidentally pressing the back button!!!?
Question.Content: anyone noes? i haven closed the page yet... i tried forward but cant, using firefox someone gotta noe the answer... pls help? ermm... anyone? monster- ctrl z doesnt work... it seems to be erased :( someone... any other suggestions?
Question.ChosenAnswer: click in the text field (box) so that you can see the cursor blinking in it and then hold down the Ctrl key and hit z - in essence Ctrl + z

Answer.Content: click in the text field (box) so that you can see the cursor blinking in it and then hold down the Ctrl key and hit z - in essence Ctrl + z
